p:
To convert the above ground dry biomass to carbon, 50% of all trees and shrubs biomass were assumed the carbon stock. So based on the aboveground trees and shrubs biomass carbon stock calculated as follows ( Brown et al., 2002):
(3)AG TSCS = AG TSDBM ∗ 0.5 where; AGTSCS: Above ground trees and shrubs carbon stocks; AG TSDBM: Above ground trees and shrubs dry biomass.
